scratchAddonsThemeDescription.message: 这能让您在扩展页面切换日夜模式

dangerTooltip.message: 需慎用。请在使用前了解此功能用处

forumWarning.message: 消息由Scratch扩展发出：确保在禁用所有浏览器扩展，包括Scratch插件，仍会发生您要报告的错误。如果你认为一个bug是由Scratch插件引起的，请$1。

forumWarningGeneral.message: 消息由Scratch扩展发出：Scratch社区禁止讨论浏览器扩展，包括Scratch扩展。不要Scratch插件与其任何功能做广告。如果你发现问题，请$1.

enablePermissionsDescription.message: Scratch扩展需要站点访问权限才能使用

permissionsScreenAlt.message: Screenshot of a dialog to enable site access

clickAllowDescription.message: 点击“允许”，Scratch会重新加载并正常工作

permissionsDenied.message: 请求权限失败，请再试一次。

extensionUpdateInfo1.message: 新功能: "gamepad support", "cat blocks", "editor sound effects"和 "remove curved stage border". 转到$1启用它们

extensionUpdateInfo2.message: 此更新还提供了一个更全面的Scratch扩展设置页面，以及编辑器中插件的性能改进。

enabled.description: 已启用加载项的类别名称

exportAndImportSettingsDescription.message: 将设置导出为JSON文件，在其他计算机上使用。

useBrowserSync.message: 您还可以通过浏览器设置同步选项来自动与其它设备同步扩展设置。

importSuccess.message: 导入设置成功。Scratch扩展将重新加载。

importFailed.message: 设置文件损坏，请再试一次。

recentlyUsed.description: 最近使用的加载项的类别名称

settingsPagePermission.message: 要开启"$1"功能，请在标签页打开设置。

exploreAllAddons.description: Placeholder is a number. Example: explore all 80+ addons

captureCommentError.message: Message added by Scratch Addons: it appears that your comment doesn't follow $1, which asks Scratchers not to advertise or name browser extensions. This comment wasn't posted because it will probably result in your account getting muted from commenting for 5 minutes.

captureCommentConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to post this comment? Scratch will probably mute your account from commenting anywhere on Scratch for at least 5 minutes.

extensionStoreDescription1.message:
➖ scratch.mit.edu features ➖
- Messaging: click the extension icon to get a summary of your messages.
- Cloud games: see who's playing multiplayer games.
- Notifier: get browser notifications when you get new messages.
- Navigation bar customization: re-add the “discuss” button.
- Make 2.0-styled pages look like 3.0.
- Website and editor dark modes.
- And more!

extensionStoreDescription2.message:
➖ Project editor features ➖
- Developer tools: adds a find box and new menu options to the editor.
- 60FPS player mode.
- Pause button.
- Onion skinning.
- Auto-hide block palette.
- Display stage on left side.
- And more!

extensionStoreDescription3.message: Keep in mind, all features are togglable! To enable or disable them, go to the settings page by clicking this extension’s icon under “extensions” in the top-right corner of your browser, and then click the gear icon.

extensionStoreDescription4.message: No usernames or passwords are stored, and you are required to be signed into your Scratch account in your browser for some features to work.
extensionStoreDescription4.description: NOTE: please only mention "Scratch" once on this string, do not repeat this word.

extensionStoreDescription5.message:
